item.description:
The topic for this meeting will be Volume - How it is misunderstood and over-rated as well as some of the ways it can be used in trading.

NOTE: This is NOT an investing group whereby we collect funds and invest in mutually agreed upon vehicles. We are an educational group interested in discussing methods, strategies, resources, and techniques to improve our own individual trading activities.

Since this meeting is after-hours, we are free to use the Library's parking lot. Our meeting room is downstairs and to the right (the Peace Dale Room).

Newcomers are certainly welcome, so if you know of others who might be interested in joining us, please refer them to this site or just bring them along to the meeting.

Hope to see you all there!
Ray
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one operating the laptop & projector.
item.why: If you're new to trading, perhaps you can learn from our mistakes and we can help you become more profitable. If you've been trading for some time then perhaps we can learn something new from you.

group.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum

item.name: Charlestown IBD Forum
